documents.document: Why I still Love Wydham Rio Ma? I love this hotel...some times i go there 3 or 4 times a year...personel are so friendly that you feel so welcome they receive yoy with this smile and I never had a problem..the rooms are great., pool i love the pool they have music and enterteinment..they are making some changes they dont have the casino open until oct 2007 they are making some changes for good..this hotel its perfect for honeymooners....

Still My favorite Why I love the Mariott..I love the condado area..the hotel its renew have everything its new..mini-Refrigerators...the personnel for me its outstanding they are very friendly..... .there always something to do at this hotel.....I love the Pool....I dont like the beach but if you Liike lots of waves this beach its for you....for me i was so happy to stay there again after 2yrs..
